title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item is different from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: It is not mentioned what steps were performed or what observations were made in the original bug report.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as content for three items and saving and previewing, the datetime values should be displayed in the same format across all items.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item. 
2. Perform unspecified steps.
